all_text_timv: Achilles Tatius. Leucippe and Clitophon Erōtikōn Achilleōs Tatiou, sive, De Clitophontis & Levcippes amoribus libri VIII ex editione Cl. Salmasiie Clitophontis. Lugd. Batavor. : Apud F. Hegerum, 1640. text txt rdacontent unmediated n rdamedia Page 148 misnumbered 48. Greek and Latin on opposite pages. Latin translation by Luigi Annibale della Croce. Includes index. Library's copy lacks t.p. De Clitophontis & Leucippes amoribus.
